attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement that anyone  exempt from wearing a mask needs proof
attributes.additional_details: The government need to do this as at the moment anyone can say they are exempt. There is no point in making new rules and having more lockdowns if people are not wearing masks in shops and closed spaces. Covid-19 will be around for the for the foreseeable future and we need to take every precaution to help reduce the risk of transmission
attributes.background: I would like it that it is made law that anyone who is exempt needs proof of not needing to wear mask,  just like  people with disabilities need a blue badge for parking.It doesn't need to say the reason but it shows shop staff/security the exemption
